teachers.name: Shubhra Roy Choudhury
teachers.description:
She is a coordinator with a heart of a teacher.

The 22 years of experience in the primary classrooms and office management did not deter her to learn a new course and give examinations to update her skills. Always open to new ideas and new concepts is her strength.
teachers.hobbies: Reading, learning a useful skill and travelling
teachers.yearsOfExperience: 22 years of experience as a teacher and Coordinator in the pre-primary and primary section

teachers.name: Himani Shah
teachers.description: She possesses the ability to become the most favourite teacher of the students. Her patience and positivity are infectious. Loves to take up challenges and solve issues.
teachers.experience: Sales profile for 4-year in Tata Press(Yellow Pages)
teachers.strengths: Organisational skills, Problem solving, communications skills, counselling, love for young children

teachers.name: Nikita Dhular Bharatiya
teachers.description: The sensitive one with a wise eye for detail. Takes into consideration all points of an activity.
teachers.hobbies: Cooking, Reading about Food and Nutrition
teachers.yearsOfExperience:
1. Primary and Pre-Primary teacher at Navsari, Gujarat. (2011 and 2012)
2.Pre-Primary teacher at Tarapur, Maharashtra. (2006-2009).
teachers.strengths: Can cope up easily with small children

teachers.name: Kadambari Vyas
teachers.description: Extremely perceptive and sensitive teacher with the passion to create a better learning experience for her students. Open to new ideas and searches for multiple answers to a problem.
teachers.yearsOfExperience: 9 years in schools like Fastrack kids, EURO Kids, UDAAN in office management and teaching duties
teachers.strengths: Desire to deliver Quality work, punctual, hardworking, self-confident, well spoken

teachers.name: Veena Alkesh Panchal
teachers.description: Extremely active and sociable, a teacher with a ‘go getter’ attitude with lots of positivity in her kit.
teachers.hobbies: Listening music, Stamp collection, Singing and craft work
teachers.strengths: Passionate for learning, Observer, Relationship building, Planning & Record keeping, Lesson delivery, Curious

teachers.name: Dharti Pujara
teachers.description: A chirpy and cheerful teacher. Has the ability to keep any class active at all times as well as disciplined. Hardworking and punctual, she loves to take up challenges and create something beautiful out of the opportunity.
teachers.education: CTE Diploma, Google Bs. Management Lesson presentation
teachers.strengths: Active listening, computer skills, management skills, Time management, teamwork, willingness to learn

teachers.name: Seema Suthar
teachers.description: A teacher with a ‘Let’s do it attitude’ She enjoys her work and makes everyone around her do the same.
teachers.hobbies: To learn something new- Creative Arts, Dancing, Travelling, Reading
teachers.strengths: Hard working, Positive attitude, Amicable, Confident

teachers.name: Daksha Patel
teachers.description: An experienced teacher with a desire to perfect her skills at teaching all the areas of pre k. She loves children and is very positive in all circumstances.
teachers.hobbies: Art- Creative work, Cooking, making friends, Reading, Listening to classical music
teachers.yearsOfExperience: 12 years of kindergarten. Pre-K- 8 years, K1, K2, Grade 1- 4 years

teachers.name: Neelam Ajay Sen
teachers.description: A very disciplined and hardworking individual. A teacher who inspires to create beautiful work.
teachers.yearsOfExperience: 1 year of teaching experience in New D.P. Campus
teachers.strengths: Team work, communication skill, leader ship and time management

teachers.name: Jasmita Devaliya
teachers.description: A quiet personality but when it comes to classroom she is in absolute action. Very hands on and practical teacher.
teachers.strengths: Cheerful, Open to new ideas, Go getter, patient, resourceful

teachers.name: Mittal Patel
teachers.description: A vivacious and outspoken person, she is a hands-on person with a quality of quick response.
teachers.hobbies: Watching new stories, Sports- Kabaddi, Volleyball

teachers.name: Kalpana Makwana
teachers.description: A dutiful teacher with a good sense of work and duty. Executes a lesson well.

teachers.name: Vaibhavi Panchal
teachers.description: A friendly and creative teacher, can empathise as she possesses the quality to become one with the students as she teaches.
teachers.yearsOfExperience: 2 years of teaching experience at New DP Campus.

teachers.name: Minakshi Swain
teachers.description: A sweet natured person with a strong work ethics. Vary patient and hardworking.
teachers.hobbies: The manual art work like Rangoli making etc., Interacting with children and learning their behaviours, listening to music, and Reading books
teachers.education: Bachelor of Arts (2007 to 2010), Intermediates in Arts (2005 to 2007) , 10th(2005)
teachers.yearsOfExperience: Worked as a pre-primary teacher in Odisha State Brigade School for 6 months in 2009

teachers.name: Payal J. Sevak
teachers.description: A very patient and observant teacher. Takes time to deliver concepts to each child.
teachers.hobbies: Reading books and discovering new stories, cooking and traveling
teachers.strengths: Calm and patient in difficult situations, ability to connect well with children

teachers.name: Tejal Suketu
teachers.description: A teacher who can easily absorb new ideas and apply it in any classroom in a preschool section.
teachers.yearsOfExperience: 7 years of teaching experience, out of which 3 years in Lampros Preschool
teachers.strengths: Strong determination, belief in hard work, eye for details, punctual

teachers.name: Dhara M. Patel
teachers.description: The teacher who oozes with creative energy. All of her concept deliveries are coloured with her wisdom and creativity
teachers.strengths: Open to new ideas and work forms, Disciplined, Patient

teachers.name: Sunita Mantri
teachers.description: A quiet but determined person. Sunita Ji is the one to get things done

teachers.name: Sapna Lalwani
teachers.description: A tranquil personality with a perceptive side. Shows eagerness to learn and apply the new age teaching techniques to the classroom. Sensitive to the kids behaviours and steps to be taken.
teachers.hobbies: Travelling, yoga, Meditation, Listening to music
